scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Hi! My name is Nemo. You all may know me from the rather popular Disney Pixar movie Finding Nemo. It's a little story about how my dad goes looking for me in the Great Barrier Reef when I was just a wee little clown fish. TL;DR is I wanted to go out exploring the great unknown because my dad, Marlin, was kinda an overprotective clown fish (mom died when I was just an egg). So I did what every angsty 6-year-old would do. Swim off by myself and explore the mysterious reef! I met so many cool people on my journey, but was honestly super happy my dad found me. Now I'm 16 years old, all grown up, and ready for my next adventure! Dad isn't as protective anymore, but he still wants me to be safe. Help me find the great treasure of the barrier reef! (I heard it gives you superpowers)...

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Awwww, sorry to hear that. If you ever want to come back and lend me a hand *waves small fin* just holler!

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Oh yes! I'm so excited for you to help me out on this new adventure! If we find the treasure, I promise you can have half of it! Let's go!

scene.name: Marlin
scene.message: Son! Son! Hey! Hey you, have you seen my son? He's a small little clown fish with an extra tiny right fin. He looks like this. Yay high and yay wide. I haven't seen this little rascal all day...

scene.name: Marlin
scene.message: You haven't? Nemo! Nemo! Where are you? Are you sure you haven't seen a little clown fish? That little rascal...

scene.name: Marlin
scene.message: Oh you have! Where is he?

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Dad. Dad. I'm right here. I was packing up some last-minute items that might help us along the way.

scene.name: Marlin
scene.message: Along the way? Where do you think you're going young man?

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Dad, you promised me that I could go on an adventure once I turned 16. I'm not even going alone, I'm taking my friend with me! They know all about the reef, so don't even sweat it!

scene.name: Marlin
scene.message: Fish can't sweat son. *Sighs* I guess you are a little big clown fish now. How long will you be gone for? Do you know how to find anemone to sleep in?

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Dad... Dad... Don't worry. I'm serious.

scene.name: Marlin
scene.message: *Deep Breath* You're right son. Be safe. If you see Crush and Squirt, let them know I said hello alright? They should be able to help you find the correct current to wherever you want to go.

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Thanks Dad. Love you.

scene.name: Marlin
scene.message: I love you too son.

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: And we're off! Which way should we swim first? We could go ask Aunty Dory up North, go find Uncle Crush and Cousin Squirt West, or Uncle Bruce South-East.

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: To Aunty Dory's it is! She should be able to give us a better idea and maybe even a map towards the treasure. She always knows the secrets of the reef!

scene.name: Dory
scene.message: So you wanna find this treasure ya say? It gives you super powers ya say?

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Yes yes!

scene.name: Dory
scene.message: I know EXACTLY what you're talking about.

scene.name: Dory
scene.message: So what did you need again?

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Oh no, her short term memory loss... Remind her what we're here for.

scene.name: Dory
scene.message: "Anything Else". That reminds me, when I was going on that marvelous adventure with your pops Nemo... "Anything Else". You know, when I was a young blue tang... I must say Nemo, I know nothing at all about "Anything Else".

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: She's getting sidetracked! C'mon, tell her what we're really here for!

scene.name: Dory
scene.message: A treasure? I don't know about a treasure, but here's a box, Nemo and friend! I picked this up when I was on my way to P. Sherman 42 Wallaby Way Sydney. I found it on some sunken pirate ship. Argh!

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Thanks Aunty Dory! This box probably has a treasure map in it. Let's go and figure out how to open the box and get to our treasure!

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Uncle Crush? Sounds radical. Hopefully he's not riding the current away right now.

scene.name: Squirt
scene.message: Woahhh Nemo? Is that you?

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Squirt?

scene.name: Squirt
scene.message: Christ Nemo, I almost didn't recognize you!

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Squirt. I DIDN'T recognize you. Is Uncle Crush home?

scene.name: Squirt
scene.message: Yea he's just chillin by the anemone. Yo Dad! Someone's here to see you.

scene.name: Crush
scene.message: Neeeeeeeeeemoooo. And frieeeeeeeeendddddd. Howzit in the dowzits?

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Uncle Crush, we're here to ask you about a secret treasure in the reef? One that gives you super powers?

scene.name: Crush
scene.message: Super powers? When you get to be my age you'll understand that waves, vibes, and flowage are the only real super powers~ but ask away, kiddo.

responses.response: what's the secret to riding currents?

scene.name: Crush
scene.message: The secret to riding currents? Hehe, I can't tell you that, you gotta ~feel~ what the ocean tells you. My little fish-kin, ask for something more useful that can guide you to the treasures unknown.

scene.name: Crush
scene.message: A map you say? I could maybe source you a map... Squirt bring me my

scene.name: Squirt
scene.message: *Brings Box*

scene.name: Crush
scene.message: I found this box when I was riding the wild ocean currents of the deep reef. We were passing some sunken pirate ship and this box was just vibin at the bow of the ship. Oh yeah. This is the one.

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Thanks Uncle Crush! What does it say on the box? Is the map inside? Let's figure out how to open it!

scene.name: Crush
scene.message: Good luck, kiddos...

scene.name: Squirt
scene.message: Bye cousin Nemo and friend!

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Uncle Bruce? He's scary, but as long as you don't bleed in front of him, he's the best uncle. He is this GIANT great-white, but he doesn't eat fish. Sustainability for our reef is his motto.

scene.name: Bruce
scene.message: *mumbles in sleep* fish are friends, not food

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Uncle Bruce. Uncle Bruce! Wake up!

scene.name: Bruce
scene.message: *opens one eye* Nemo! How is my favorite clown fish nephew doing!

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Hi Uncle Bruce, this is my friend.

scene.name: Bruce
scene.message: Quite the fish you are. Oh Nemo you've grown so much! What are you doing here? Uncle Anchor and Chum are sleeping in the next room. Would you like me to wake them?

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: No it's okay Uncle Bruce, we're here to ask you if you would know about a map that would lead us to a treasure in the reef.

scene.name: Bruce
scene.message: A treasure? What kind of treasure you say?

scene.name: Bruce
scene.message: Ah, you're looking for the 'tesoro del arrecife'.

scene.name: Bruce
scene.message: A Killer Whale? You small little fish are better off searching for a giant pot of gold in the deep sea. Which reminds me, how are Marlin and Dory doing?

scene.name: Bruce
scene.message: Blackbeard's Treasure eh? All the great treasures of the sea begin and end with me, the LEGENDARY GREAT WHITE. Which reminds me, how are Marlin and Dory doing?

scene.name: Bruce
scene.message: Captain Jack Sparrow's Pirate Hat? Doesn't ring a bell. Which reminds me, how are Marlin and Dory doing?

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: They're doing just great Uncle Bruce! Cmon, tell him what we're REALLY here for!

scene.name: Chum
scene.message: 'tesoro del arrecife'?

scene.name: Bruce
scene.message: Boys, our nephew Nemo and his friend here are looking for 'tesoro del arrecife'.

scene.name: Anchor
scene.message: Oh Nemo, the 'tesoro del arrecife', is but a childhood myth!

scene.name: Bruce
scene.message: Well my boys, it USED to be but a myth. 'tesoro del arrecife' is real, and I've seen it myself. Before I founded the fish-friendly shart support group, I journeyed to the deep reef, and I saw the 'tesoro del arrecife' with my own eyes. But alas, I was blinded by a large school of fish, and went to eat them all.

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: It's okay Uncle Bruce, everyone makes mistakes! It's who we are now that's important. Ask Uncle Bruce for the key to the treasure!

scene.name: Bruce
scene.message: A map you say? There is no map to the 'tesoro del arrecife'. But. There is a box to the 'tesoro del arrecife'. Anchor, bring me the box on my bed stand.

scene.name: Anchor
scene.message: *Brings Box*

scene.name: Bruce
scene.message: My little fish friend, ask for something more useful that can guide you to the 'tesoro del arrecife'.

scene.name: Bruce
scene.message: I found this box when I was exploring a sunken pirate ship. It's actually where I met your Uncle Anchor and Chum.

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Thanks Uncle Bruce! Hey, what does it say on the box? Is the map inside? Let's figure out how to open it!

scene.name: Bruce
scene.message: Good luck my little ones...

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Well. Now we have a box. But no map. How do we even know this box is right?

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: You're right. We should take a closer look at the box.

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Exploring the ocean doesn't really get us anywhere now. Try to think of something better we can do with this box!

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: *carefully inspects box* Nemo: Look! It says, “treasure of the reef” with a lock on one side and there's a riddle on the other side! Let's read what the riddle says.

scene.name: Riddle
scene.message: “I am a ship that can be made to ride the greatest waves. I am not built by tool, but built by hearts and minds. What am I?”

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: “Friendship” you say? That might work! Try putting it into the alphabet lock!

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Love doesn't work. The box is still locked. Let's try again.

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Oh, good answer! Dangit, it still doesn't work.

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Silly “user”, pirate ships are built by tools!

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: *Click* *Clack* Hey, that worked! I'm so happy we became friends and went on this adventure together. Let's open the box now! What's inside?

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: What does it say?

scene.name: MAP
scene.message: *Picture of Mirror*

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: It's just... It's just a mirror? Is there nothing else?

scene.name: Mirror
scene.message: Engraved into the bottom corner of the mirror: “The greatest treasure is not visible by eye. It is rather found in the heart”

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: Hey, it's us in the mirror. Do you think...

scene.name: Nemo
scene.message: The super power we were looking for... Maybe it's not a superpower, but it's the friendships we made along the way, that make us feel extraordinary...
